comments:
I20071107-1300

Doubleclick a nested entry in the Error Log view (e.g. the one from bug 207752) => NPE

Even worse: If you open the Event Details dialog and then select such a nested entry, the log fills up with tons of this NPE (until you select a top-level entry inside a session).
